pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compare Detrital Zircon Suites // Compare detrital zircon suites by uploading univariate, U-Pb age, or bivariate, U-Pb age and Lu-Hf data, in a shiny-based user-interface. Outputs publication quality figures using ggplot2, and tables of statistics currently in use in the detrital zircon geochronology community.
